title: ActivateAlarm (Method)
text:
METHOD ActivateAlarm : BOOL
The alarm can be deactivated by calling IAlarmHandler9.DeactivateAlarm.
Returns TRUE if the operation was successful and the alarm was found.
This method uses semaphore synchronization with AlarmEvaluation_PRG.

rows.Name: usiAlarmGroupID
rows.Comment: The ID of the alarm group, where the event is declared

rows:
The ID of the alarm, that have to be raised. Here the corresponding enum value
has to be passed, where the name of the generated enum is:
Alm_<Name of the alarm group>_Alarm_IDs
The enumeration member has the same name like the ID of the alarm
